title: Platner Armchair Black
body: It was 1966 when Warren Platner came up with a stunning dining chair that brings mid-century modern elegance to any dining room decor. It gave way to the definition of “a classic” as something that, “every time you look at it, you accept it as it is and see no way of improving it.” Platner clearly knew his stuff, since he designed this chair, it has maintained its status as a design darling for nearly 60 years. Platner’s design was the beginning of the ‘decorative, gentle, graceful’ shapes in the design world.
